|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "LPC0011 REV:2.2" is silkscreened on the board. This device is OEM Loopcomm (but the silkscreened font is a bit wonky compared to other Loopcomm products).
There are two [[Skyworks]] ('''SiGe''') [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=956 SE2595L] dual-band 802.11n FEMs on-board.
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/31737-amped-wireless-adds-pair-o-directional-usb-adapters ''Amped Wireless Adds Pair O' Directional USB Adapters'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.ampedwireless.com/datasheets/Amped_UA2000_Datasheet_LR.pdf Datasheet]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
